thread.title: Simon & Schuster cancels Milo Yiannopoulos' book deal
thread.title_full: Simon & Schuster cancels Milo Yiannopoulos' book deal - seattlepi.com

title: Simon & Schuster cancels Milo Yiannopoulos' book deal
text:
Publishers Weekly , a literary trade magazine, reports that Simon & Schuster has canceled its publication of a controversial book authored by Breitbart editor Milo Yiannopoulos. He confirmed the news on his Facebook page .
Yiannopoulos, frequently described as a far-right " provocateur ," faced criticism Monday when he made comments on pedophilia that caused public outrage over the weekend.
The Conservative Political Action Conference, which had booked him as a speaker on Wednesday, rescinded his invitation as a result, calling the subsequent apology he posted to his Facebook " insufficient ."
Simon & Schuster is canceling the publication of 'Dangerous' by Milo Yiannopoulos "After careful consideration." Full story coming soon.
— Publishers Weekly (@PublishersWkly) February 20, 2017 Publishers Weekly says that Simon & Schuster has scrapped the project "after careful consideration."
One who consistently gets the issues right, these days, is CNN’s Jake Tapper. After the vile filth of Yiannopoulos’ comments spread, Tapper set about a tweet storm, speaking on behalf of a friend who had survived the sex trafficking industry.
Media: WochIt Media Amazon still lists Yiannopoulos' book, "Dangerous" as available for pre-sale .
SFGATE has reached out to Simon & Schuster for comment and will update when we receive a response.
